title: Get a Euri the Euro t-shirt
content:
On the weekend report of UK Channel 4’s ’This is a Knife’ Rachna the presenter said to send in an email if you want a Euri the Euro t-shirt:

View the video and then select ’suggest a story’ to get the email address then provide:

- subject: Euri t-shirt  
- Where you are from  
- Why you want one

UK only it seems

Check the site [www.channel4.com/knife](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808225129/http:/www.channel4.com/knife "www.channel4.com/knife")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808225129im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EuriT.jpg)

 [‹ Test Print-outs](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808225129/http:/typophile.com/node/19146 "Go to previous forum topic") [Any utilities for OS X that check kerning pairs? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808225129/http:/typophile.com/node/19148 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vinceconnare

comments.content: Is Euri the Euro, in fact, eurinating? And what the heck is it?
he’s in the grass man in the grass...
